law.catch_line: In this section and §§ 19-344 and 19-345 of this subtitle, "facility" means a related institution ...

text.section: In this section and §§ 19-344 and 19-345 of this subtitle, "facility" means a related institution that, under the rules and regulations of the Department, is a comprehensive care facility or an extended care facility.

section.section: The General Assembly intends to promote the interests and well-being of each resident of a facility.
